remarks: The sum of two group sums.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)  Obsolete version of ~ gsumzaddlem as of 5-Jun-2019. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
gsumzaddOLD.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumzaddOLD.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsumzaddOLD.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
gsumzaddOLD.z $e |- Z = ( Cntz ` G ) $.
gsumzaddOLD.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) $.
gsumzaddOLD.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsumzaddOLD.fn $e |- ( ph -> ( `' F " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin ) $.
gsumzaddOLD.hn $e |- ( ph -> ( `' H " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin ) $.
gsumzaddlemOLD.w $e |- W = ( `' ( F u. H ) " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
gsumzaddlemOLD.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
gsumzaddlemOLD.h $e |- ( ph -> H : A --> B ) $.
gsumzaddlemOLD.1 $e |- ( ph -> ran F C_ ( Z ` ran F ) ) $.
gsumzaddlemOLD.2 $e |- ( ph -> ran H C_ ( Z ` ran H ) ) $.
gsumzaddlemOLD.3 $e |- ( ph -> ran ( F oF .+ H ) C_ ( Z ` ran ( F oF .+ H ) ) ) $.
gsumzaddlemOLD.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x C_ A /\ k e. ( A \ x ) ) ) -> ( F ` k ) e. ( Z ` { ( G gsum ( H |` x ) ) } ) ) $.
gsumzaddlemOLD $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( F oF .+ H ) ) = ( ( G gsum F ) .+ ( G gsum H ) ) ) $.
$d .+ k x $.
$d .0. k x $.
$d A k x $.
$d B k x $.
$d F k x $.
$d G k x $.
$d H k x $.
$d V x $.
$d W k x $.
$d Z k x $.
$d k ph x $.
